be.fedict.eid.applet.sc

Class PcscEid

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • be.fedict.eid.applet.sc.PcscEid

  • public class PcscEid
extends Observable
    Holds all functions related to eID card access over PC/SC.
    Author:
    Frank Cornelis
